original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Naphtali: The Lord has blessed Naphtali's tribe very much. He has been very kind to them. Land in the west and in the south will belong to them. I pray this for the tribe of Naphtali:
korean_text: 납달리에 대하여는 일렀으되 은혜가 풍성하고 여호와의 복이 가득한 납달리여 너는 서쪽과 남쪽을 차지할지로다

sentences.original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Naphtali:
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 납달리 지파를 위해 이렇게 기도합니다:

sentences.original_text: The Lord has blessed Naphtali's tribe very much.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 납달리 지파를 매우 많이 축복하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He has been very kind to them.
Land in the west and in the south will belong to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 서쪽과 남쪽의 땅이 그들에게 속할 것입니다.
